translations.en:
: ** :fireworks: You're going up a hill. As you look around, you see lights in the distance. As you get closer, you also hear music. It's a festival! Excited to party, you run to the city.

:dart: Go to a game stand
:circus_tent: Go to an item stand
:oden: Go to a food stand 

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
